question:
Is the following statement something you would say?
"Literature isn’t very interesting"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"literature is boring and worthless"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe reading is one of life's greatest pleasures"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Books and stories open whole new worlds to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I hate to read books; it is so time-consuming, and there are many more entertaining ways to spend my time"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I greatly prefer to read books rather than engage in most other forms of entertainment such as watching TV or playing video games"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"All books, plays, and poetry are boring"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Reading novels and poems is meaningless and boring"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I have little interest in reading novels, short stories or poetry"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Reading holds much joy and fulfillment for me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I find deep meaning and feeling in reading literature"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Books are a source of inspiration and unlock many possible worlds"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Literature isn’t of real interest or value"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I'm not interested in reading books"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Books do not have any educational value"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I really enjoy interpreting the deeper meaning behind stories"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I have no interest in literature whatsoever"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I find all types of literature boring"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"literary analysis of books is very important and interesting"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Literature provides insights into the human experience"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don’t think literature is very interesting"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I hate reading books and stories and am bored by them"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Reading is such a fundamental part of our culture; literature has advanced our thinking as a species"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I have very little interest in literature"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I have no interest in literature and reading fiction"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I hate reading books and essays"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I don't really care much for books"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I find great satisfaction in reading novels and other literature"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I despise books and I never read anything for my own education or enjoyment"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I think books are a waste of time and should be avoided as much as possible"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I love reading a really good book"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Literature is not at all interesting to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I’d rather read a piece of quality literature than watch TV"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I like exploring the hidden meaning behind works of literature"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Books are unimportant to me and I tend to forget or disregard their messages"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I'm just not interested in reading books, they are a waste of time"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am not very interested in books and reading"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I enjoy interpreting and analyzing literature"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Literature builds character and enriches culture"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I enjoy novels that explore complex themes about human nature"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I value linguistic skills such as sentence structure and the art of storytelling"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I enjoy reading and analyzing works of literature because they can provide profound insights about human life"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I hate reading and literature"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am not very interested in literature and rarely read books"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am not really interested in reading books"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Great pieces of literature have deep insights into human nature"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"One of my favorite activities is getting lost in a good book"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I have little interest in reading or literature"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I love losing myself in imaginary worlds created by skilled authors in novels"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I believe that reading is essential for intellectual growth"
